about_the_game:
This is the old version of Head To Hell 黄泉旅客

It has a more confusing story with a vague guide. XD

But the description and mechanic have never been changed

"You looked quite old, at least 40"

According to the "TEXT"'s words, people who reach the age of 35 will be the passenger, there're too many people living in cities after all.

"Alright, just keep moving."

Head to hell is a exploration game and also a walking simulator. You wake up on a train, and intetact with the strange “TEXT” around you.

Observe and judge everything. There're two doors in every carriage. You will make a choice. You will be making a lot of choices.

The TEXT is guiding you to escape from this circle curse,

Should you listen to he?

Who is he? Where is the train heading?

There're strange surroundings, little spooky atmosphere and a chatterbox on a moving train.

The only way to understand everything is moving, but sometimes the text will disturb your thinking. (How dare he!!!)


About Video Distribution

Anyone can make videos without permission

Sincerely appreciate to any re-creation

fullgame.name: Head To Hell 黄泉旅客

name: Head To Hell: Olden Days

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4300U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660/ AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-5820K/ AMD r5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080/ AMD RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2.2 GB available space
